means: 相符合( correspond的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: A change in the money supply brings a corresponding change in expenditure.
sentence.Network_cn: 货币供应量的改变随即引起支出的相应改变。

sentence.Network_en: What we required you to do is corresponding to the contract.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要你做的事情符合合同规定.

sentence.Network_en: It has name corresponding to the facts.
sentence.Network_cn: 它有着与事实相符的名称.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... diploma n. 文凭 corresponding a. 相应的 misdemeanor n. 轻罪.
相字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 相应〖 correspond〗 相应〖 corresponding〗 相与〖 together;dealwithsb.;getalongwithsb.〗.
简爱经典对白 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... 13. situate v. 使位于; 使处于 14. corresponding a. 符合的;一致的 15. frame n. 体格.
会计英语第八讲 ... bad debts n. 呆帐,坏帐 corresponding adj. 相应的,对应的 American Express n. 美国运通卡.

list.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... construction n. 建筑业 correspondence n. 通信 education n. 教育.
对字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 对弈〖 playchess〗 对应〖 correspondence;homologous〗 对于〖 inregardto;asto;for〗.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... corpus 身体，尸体 correspond 符合；相当 corrupt 腐败的；贪污的.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... corpus 身体，尸体 correspond 符合；相当 corrupt 腐败的；贪污的.
急求常用的英语单词_百度知道 ... forefather/ancestors 祖先 journalist/correspondent 记者 joy/delight 欢乐.
英语新闻常用词汇大全 - 豆丁网 ... star reporter 一流通讯员 correspondent 通讯员 special correspondent 特派员.

entry.def: If one thing corresponds to another, there is a close similarity or connection between them. You can also say that two things correspond .

example.ex: Racegoers will be given a number which will correspond to a horse running in a race...
example.tran: 观看赛马比赛的观众将获得一个与某一匹赛马相对应的号码。

example.ex: A 22 per cent increase in car travel corresponds with a 19 per cent drop in cycle mileage per person...
example.tran: 乘车出行者的比率上升了22%，与之相对应，人均骑自行车的行驶里程下降了19%。

entry.def: If you correspond with someone, you write letters to them. You can also say that two people correspond .

example.ex: She still corresponds with American friends she met in Majorca nine years ago...
example.tran: 她仍与9年前在马略卡岛结识的美国朋友们通信。

sentences.sentence: "all rights carry with them corresponding responsibilities"

means.word_mean: 2. similar especially in position or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the like period of the preceding year"

means.word_mean: 4. agreeing in amount, magnitude, or degree;

sentences.sentence: "the figures are large but the corresponding totals next year will be larger"

auth_sentence.content: Resigned to Life consists of two corresponding song types.
auth_sentence.res_content: Resigned to Life consists of two corresponding song types.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Resigned to Life consists of two corresponding song types.

auth_sentence.content: I decided that I would try corresponding with him.
auth_sentence.res_content: I decided that I would try corresponding with him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I decided that I would try corresponding with him.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, the corresponding proportion was around 50%.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last year, the corresponding proportion was around 50%.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, the corresponding proportion was around 50%.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立足处;稳固的地位,基础

means.word_mean: 相当的, 对应的，相应的，相关的

sentences.cn: 一切权利都带有与之相应的责任。

sentences.en: It has name corresponding to the facts.
sentences.cn: 它有着与事实相符的名称。

sentences.en: What we required you to do is corresponding to the contract.

jushi.english: All rights carry with them corresponding responsibilities.
jushi.chinese: 一切权利都带有与之相应的责任。

jushi.english: Exports for the first three months are larger by 20 percent than those for the corresponding period of last year.
jushi.chinese: 今年第一季度的出口比去年同期增长20%。

jushi.english: It has name corresponding to the facts.
jushi.chinese: 它有着与事实相符的名称。
